mapper.select: select a.rno, a.writing_Id, a.uid, a.replyText, b.fullName from gr_reply a, gr_attach b where a.uid = b.uid and writing_Id = #{writing_Id} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into gr_reply (writing_Id, uid, replyText) values (#{writing_Id}, #{uid}, #{replyText})
mapper.update: update gr_reply set replyText = #{replyText} where rno = #{rno}
